Discussion

Mailing List

I've set up a Pushlet discussion hosted by www.yahoogroups.com. Preferably use this list for any feedback/discussion on: browser problems, critisisms, ideas or any other issues. You can still mail me directly at just[AT]justobjects.nl but I would prefer that you use the list so that opinions can be shared.

Join the discussion list through the form below or browse the Pushlet discussion archives.

Subscribe to pushlet
